author: Ryan Daws
description:
An AI tool aims to wade through mountains of government feedback and understand what the public is trying to say. UK Technology Secretary Peter Kyle said: “No one should be wasting time on something AI can do quicker and better, let alone wasting millions of taxpayer pounds on outsourcing such work to contractors. This digital […]

The post AI tool speeds up government feedback, experts urge caution appeared first on AI News.
title: AI tool speeds up government feedback, experts urge caution

author: Ryan Daws
description:
Alibaba has unveiled Wan2.1-VACE, an open-source AI model designed to shake up how we create and edit videos. VACE isn’t appearing out of thin air; it’s part of Alibaba’s broader Wan2.1 family of video AI models. And they’re making a rather bold claim for it, stating it’s the “first open-source model in the industry to […]

The post Alibaba Wan2.1-VACE: Open-source AI video tool for all appeared first on AI News.
title: Alibaba Wan2.1-VACE: Open-source AI video tool for all
